comments:
The recommended way to install the Callisto release of Eclipse is to download and install the Platform Runtime Binary, then installed the features you're interested in via the Update Manager.  If you do this, the source for the Eclipse platform is not installed. This causes an NPE in the New Visual Class wizard when looking up the source attachment for SWT. This happens because the bundle returned by the Platform.getBundle(srcPluginID) call on line 632 is null, even though the srcPluginID is correct.

Here's the stack trace:
!ENTRY org.eclipse.ve.java.core 4 0 2006-06-21 22:09:36.144
!MESSAGE Exception thrown.
!STACK 0

*** Bug 144464 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
Verified working in the R-1.2-200606280938 build.
Closing now that VE 1.2 is released.
